As Hellpeon continued his pursuit he heard the sound of blaster fire 
behind him. The large enerby being turned around silently jst as all 
25 blasts were about to him hit him. From antillas point of view a 
huge bright flash occured as the blasts seemed to hit dead on target. 
However as the flash subsided Hellpeon foated in the air unphased as 
a barrier of Chaochitan energy surrounded him. Without warning the 
beast flew stright for Attilla and opened fire on him with 8 beams of 
the deadly Chaochitan energy on the robot firing two beams from each 
wing blaster.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Alecto/Attilla/::
> 
> Alecto flew where Starscream was and she tried to carried him to 
> BlackFortress. 
> 
> Attilla Shouted "I don't know who're you... But you'll regret it"
> and he fired 25 times against  Hellpeon
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > Hellpeon remains silent as he watches Starscream go into stasis 
> lock. 
> > The Infecticon Inforcer seemingly smirks as he sends a large beam 
> of 
> > the highly powered chaochitan energy before he flys up in to the 
> air 
> > and flys after Incarcinator.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > > :::Starscream:::
> > > 
> > > ::Starscream all of a sudden got the feeling that someone was 
> > behind him.  he 
> > > turned around, but it was too late.  He got hit head on by the 
> > chaochitan 
> > > energy.  In a last ditch effort to be saved, he opened his comm 
> on 
> > an all 
> > > Pack Predacon frequency::
> > > Starscream: Th- this is Starscream. I've been damaged heavily 
by 
> an 
> > unknown 
> > > bot.  Please c-come and h-help. My coordinates are(he gives his 
> > coordinates).
> > > ::he cloeses his comm and falls into stasis lock::
